lessons.japanese: すぐに諦めて昼寝をするかも知れない。
lessons.indonesian: I may give up soon and just nap instead.

lessons.japanese: すぐに諦めて昼寝をするかも知れない。
lessons.indonesian: I may give up soon and just nap instead.

lessons.japanese: すぐに諦めて昼寝をするかも知れない。
lessons.indonesian: Maybe I'll just give up soon and take a nap instead.

lessons.japanese: すぐに諦めて昼寝をするかも知れない。
lessons.indonesian: I may give up soon and just take a nap.

lessons.japanese: 彼が死んだものと諦めてはいけない。
lessons.indonesian: You should not give him up for lost.

lessons.japanese: 希望がなくなったから諦めたのではなかった。
lessons.indonesian: I didn't give up for lack of hope.
Resignation is the first lesson of life.

lessons.japanese: 何事にも諦めがたいせつ。
lessons.indonesian: Resignation is the first lesson of life.

lessons.japanese: 雨で我々は外出を諦めた。
lessons.indonesian: The rain discouraged us from going out.

lessons.japanese: 何でフランス語を学ぶっていう目的を諦めちゃったの？
lessons.indonesian: Why did you give up the idea of learning French?

lessons.japanese: しかたがないと諦める。
サムに計画を諦めるように説得したが上手く行かなかった。
lessons.indonesian: I tried to persuade Sam to give up his plan, only to fail.
I can't give up on my dreams.

lessons.japanese: あなたの激励がなかったら、この計画は諦めていたでしょうね。
lessons.indonesian: Without your encouragement, I should have given up the plan.
